full_summary:
### Canadian Acute-Care Point Prevalence Survey (CAPPS) - Notice of Solicitation
#### Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC)

**Solicitation Number:** 1000252004

**Publication Date:** August 2, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** September 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM ET

**Description:**
The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) seeks to engage a service provider to conduct a Canadian Acute-Care Point Prevalence Survey (CAPPS) focusing on healthcare-associated infections (HAIs), antimicrobial resistance (AMR), and antimicrobial use (AMU). The survey will provide essential data to inform best practices in hospital-specific infection prevention and control (IPC) programs and antimicrobial stewardship programs (ASP).

As part of this work, a pilot project will validate data from a representative sample of acute-care hospitals across Canada. The survey aims to:

* Improve access to HAI, AMR, and AMU data
* Inform IPC and ASP to reduce HAIs and AMR rates
* Reduce healthcare costs
* Enhance patient care

**Service Provider Requirements:**

* Established national organization or association with a specialization in medical microbiology or infectious disease medicine
* Ability to ensure national representation and data standardization

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
**Trade Agreements:** The following trade agreements may apply to this tender:
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
